Text:
function EP02_25()
    --.転-7【6月第4週】「決戦前夜・戦姫のファッション」
    SaveData.Title = "決戦前夜・戦姫のファッション"

    -- ステータス[ビジュアル]が２レベル以下の場合はオウガルートへ

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")

PLAY_BGM("BGM01.wav",0)

    --//BU：アキラ（驚き・私服）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The day before the Princess Election. When I reported that I had finished reading all the books Akira lent me three weeks ago, for some reason she was amazed. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0248.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Surprised・Roomwear
 "Ah, I'm amazed... Did you really read all those books?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Surprised・Casual clothes
 "W-weren't you the one who told me to read them, Akira?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0249.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad・Roomwear
 "That's true, but..." ]])

    MSG([[ For these three weeks, I really spent all my waking hours either reading fashion magazines or practicing makeup. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to that, I was able to understand, at least to some extent, the meaning behind current fashion trends and styles of wearing clothes that I had never paid attention to before. ]])

    MSG([[ And above all, what I understood was— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0250.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "So, now you get it, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual clothes
 "Yeah, I understand it well." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0389.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Sad・Casual clothes
 "That half-baked... we absolutely can’t win against Lira-san." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0251.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirking・Roomwear
 "Exactly. Well done." ]])

    MSG([[ What I learned from studying fashion was that the key point is precisely sense. ]])

    MSG([[ I gained confidence that I learned a lot about current trends, color combinations, how to use accent colors, and even easily combinable items. ]])

    MSG([[ But no matter how much knowledge you acquire, sense is not something you can easily develop. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0252.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "To be honest, fashion is something anyone can improve up to a certain level." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0253.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Since the rules are established, you just need to follow them. But charismatic people like Lira Hoozuki create their own rules." ]])

    MSG([[ Yes. After learning more deeply, I understood very well. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san's fashion is different from the trends. Yet, that’s why she is so highly regarded. ]])

    MSG([[ Not following existing trends, but creating new ones—that’s what makes a fashion leader. ]])

    MSG([[ And to create trends, in addition to solid knowledge, sharp sense and absolute confidence in one’s own sensibility are indispensable. ]])

    MSG([[ Without those, there’s no way to stand on par with Lira-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0390.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual clothes
 "But if I hadn’t gained the knowledge, I probably would have approached the stage with half-hearted fashion efforts." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0391.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual clothes
 "In that sense, the studying was worth it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0254.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Without basic knowledge, you can’t even grasp the difference in skill levels." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0255.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirking・Roomwear
 "It’s like an ant biting a human. The ant doesn’t even know it will be crushed a second later." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0392.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual clothes
 "That’s... a horrible example... but I get what you mean." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I think acquiring knowledge means making a ruler inside yourself. ]])

    MSG([[ Without a ruler, you don’t understand the exact distance to your goal, so your effort is vague. ]])

    MSG([[ But with a ruler, you can understand how much effort you need to get closer to your goal. ]])

    MSG([[ And the difference the ruler showed me between me and Lira-san—was just too huge. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0256.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "But isn’t it good? I still think the election appeal Minato came up with is the best." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0257.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Well, how well this odd strategy will be accepted in a prestigious school—that’s the problem, though." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0393.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Serious・Casual clothes
 "...Yeah. That’s right. For that, I have to do my best tomorrow." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Soon after I started learning about fashion, I began to vaguely realize that I couldn’t win against Lira-san head to head. ]])

    MSG([[ So I came up with one breakthrough. An appeal expressing my own—Erika Ikusa’s—‘fashion.’ ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0394.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual clothes
 "Akira made the costume too, so there’s not much left to prepare. I feel kind of restless." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0258.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smile・Roomwear
 "Are you planning to enter tomorrow’s election looking pale? At least tonight, go to bed quietly." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira firmly pushed me into her room and urged me to sleep. For some reason, she’s unusually pushy today. ]])

    MSG([[ Well, I already finished brushing my teeth and taking a bath so I can sleep anytime. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0395.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual clothes
 "Aren’t you going to sleep yet, Akira?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0259.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Smirking・Roomwear
 "I don’t have school anymore. Actually, now is the golden time for gamers." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0396.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Wry smile・Casual clothes
 "Ah, don’t stay up too late. Good night, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0260.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Yes, good night." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I turned off the light and collapsed onto the bed. ]])

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, it’s been a while since I’ve slept in a bed. ]])

    MSG([[ Ah. No. I can’t hold on anymore. A wave of sleepiness rushed over me all at once, and my consciousness was fading— ]])

STOP_BGM(2000)
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0397.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Normal・Casual clothes
 "I will definitely win... sister..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //ステータス判定：[ビジュアル]が２レベル以下の場合、オウガルートへ
if SaveData.TrainingParam.Visual <= 2 and SCENARIO_DEBUG == false then
    OgaEnd("EP_OGA_01_01" , "EP_BAD_02" , "EP02_01")
    return
end
    --　　　　　◆

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    --//BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0261.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Alright. Looks like Minachin finally went to sleep quietly." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0262.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad・Roomwear
 "Haa... After all this preparation, to want to base the costume on ‘this’ right before the election..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0263.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Sad・Roomwear
 "We had to redo the whole setup from scratch, and normally this would never have been ready on time." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0264.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Normal・Roomwear
 "Well... complaining doesn’t help, so shall we get started?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0265.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】Serious・Roomwear
 "We have to finish it even if we have to pull an all-nighter." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    --　　　　　◆

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP02_26")
end
